content.raw:
With 1.2.0, the texture is blacked out like in this screencaptured video: http://youtu.be/3lD3KBiBiU8
The video was taken on OSX 10.10 - Chrome but I saw the same occurred on Ubuntu 14.04 - Chrome 40.0.

Working fine with 1.1.0 like this 
![hakuto_gzweb_ubuntu1204_tetris_there_822x522.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/2493517038-hakuto_gzweb_ubuntu1204_tetris_there_822x522.png)

1.2.0 UI looks even more friendly than 1.1.0 so I'd like this issue to be figured out. I haven't dug much into the issue but will keep working on this. I appreciate if anyone shares anything that might be relevant.

FYI the Gazebo package in use: https://github.com/tork-a/hakuto
content.html:
With 1.2.0, the texture is blacked out like in this screencaptured video: http://youtu.be/3lD3KBiBiU8 The video was taken on OSX 10.10 - Chrome but I saw the same occurred on Ubuntu 14.04 - Chrome 40.0.

Working fine with 1.1.0 like this

1.2.0 UI looks even more friendly than 1.1.0 so I'd like this issue to be figured out. I haven't dug much into the issue but will keep working on this. I appreciate if anyone shares anything that might be relevant.

FYI the Gazebo package in use: https://github.com/tork-a/hakuto
